Entries.Robin: Hey there!^I had some extra wood lying around... I thought maybe you could use it. Take care!  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} %item object 388 50 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}
Entries.Demetrius: Dear @,^I was conducting a field study the other day, and I found this specimen. ^I hope you find it as interesting as I did.    ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}%item object 392 1 394 1 132 1 66 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}
Entries.Linus: Hello, friend.^The mountain lake has been kind to me lately. I'd like to share my good fortune with you.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}} %item object 136 1 143 1 202 1 227 1 228 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}
Entries.Pierre: Dear valued customer,^Thanks for visiting '{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s'! Enclosed is your 'Cash-back Rewards Program' rebate. See you soon! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}^  P.S. Sorry for the stock message, @. Enjoy! %item money 250 601  %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}
Entries.Caroline: Dear @,^Here's a vegetable from the little garden I keep out back. You probably have more veggies than you know what to do with, but oh well.   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}%item object 190 1 192 1 24 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}
Entries.George: Found some good quality stone.^Maybe you can build with it or something.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} %item object 390 35 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}
Entries.Evelyn: Hello there, dear,  I hope your farm is doing well.^ I'm sending you a little something from my kitchen... I hope it didn't crumble in the mail.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}%item object 216 1 220 1 223 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}
Entries.Pam: Hey. ^I found this in a drawer somewhere. Thought you could use it.   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} %item object 346 1 349 1 787 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}
Entries.Lewis: @,^I'm really glad you've become part of our community! I've enclosed a 500g check from the Stardew Valley Agricultural Fund to help you continue your good work. ^Maybe you can buy some more seeds with it.  ^  Sincerely, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}%item money 500 501 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}
Entries.Gus: @!^I made you a little treat this morning in the saloon. Dig in!   ^   -Your friend, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}%item object 224 1 213 1 211 1 207 1 200 1 195 1 198 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}
Entries.Clint: Um, Hello...^Sorry, I'm not good at writing letters. I made one metal bar too many, and I thought you might need it.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}, the blacksmith %item object 334 1 335 1 336 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}
Entries.Jodi: Dear @,^I ordered too much fertilizer for the garden!! I bet you can put it to some good use. Take care!  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}} %item object 368 5 369 5 370 5 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}
Entries.Kent: Hello, @.^This item was collecting dust in the toolshed. I figured you might be able to use it.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}}%item object 286 1 287 1 288 1 787 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}}
Entries.Emily: Hi!^How are you doing? I hope you enjoy the gift I've sent you... Well, goodbye! +   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} %item object 397 1 428 1 440 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}
Entries.Marnie: Dear @,^You're such a good neighbor I thought I'd send over some animal feed to make your job easier. Keep it up! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} %item object 178 30 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}
Entries.Shane: Hey,^I thought it would be fun to send you a letter. I don't really know what to write, though.^ Here, I've enclosed a treat for you. Don't tell anyone, but I snagged this from the back room of JojaMart ages ago.^Okay, see you soon. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}} %item object 215 1 206 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}}
Entries.Wizard: Greetings, young adept.^I have enclosed in this package an item of arcane significance. Use it wisely.   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}%item object 422 1 82 1 84 1 70 1 %%[#]A Gift From the {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}
Entries.Sandy: Greetings from Calico Desert!^Come visit me soon, I'm really bored out here :(. I've included a gift from the desert. You can come and thank me in person!   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}} %item object 88 1 90 1 218 1 %%[#]A Gift From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}}
Entries.afterSamShow: @,^the show was a rockin' success! I wanted to say thanks again for all your help in creating this amazing band. We couldn't have done it without you!   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}'s Thank-you Note
Entries.afterArtShow: Dear @,^Thanks again for coming to my art show. It was such a success! I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and everyone was so positive and encouraging! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LeahName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LeahName}}'s Thank-you Note
Entries.haleyGarden: @,^I thought it would be fun to write you a note.^ I had so much fun with the cows yesterday... I'm starting to understand why you chose the farmer's life! Hope to see you soon.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}'s Note
Entries.PennyCleanTrailer: Sorry about what happened at my place yesterday... My mom can get into bad moods sometimes.^Please just forget it happened.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}'s Apology
Entries.Duck: Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise chickens, so I'm now selling ducks at my shop!       ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}[#]Ducks For Sale!
Entries.Rabbits: Dear @,^I now have rabbits in the animal shop! They will provide you with fluffy wool ...and more!       ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}[#]Rabbits For Sale!
Entries.Sheep: Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise cows, so I'm now selling sheep at my shop!       ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}[#]Sheep For Sale!
Entries.Goats: Dear @,^I now have goats available for purchase at the animal shop. You've done well so far!       ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}[#]Goats For Sale!
Entries.Pigs: Dear @,^You've come a long way since you first arrived. As a result, I've decided to start selling pigs at my shop. These pigs are trained at finding gourmet truffles!       ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}[#]Pigs For Sale!
Entries.SeaAmulet: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask for someone's hand in marriage, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town understands the significance of the amulet. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Entries.Bouquet: @,^It seems like you're starting to get close with some of the townspeople. If you want to show someone that you're romantically interested, you've got to give them one of my beautiful flower bouquets. I'm selling them now, for a very fair price! If you want to start a family someday, this is the first step! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}[#]About Bouquets
Entries.RobinCooking: Dear @,^here is an old recipe that my grandma passed down to me. Enjoy!   ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s Family Recipe
Entries.DemetriusCooking: I wanted to say 'thanks' for taking an interest in my work. Here's a cooking recipe that I like. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}' Recipe
Entries.LinusCooking: @,^how are you doing? I've enclosed some instructions on how to make one of my favorite fish recipes. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}' Recipe
Entries.PierreCooking: TOP SECRET:^Here's the recipe for my famous blueberry tart.^Don't tell anyone! I'm giving it to you because we are such good friends. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s Famous Tart
Entries.CarolineCooking: Dear @,^nothing is more satisfying than cooking with fresh vegetables from your own garden! I've enclosed a recipe to help you out. Take care, ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}'s Recipe
Entries.GeorgeCooking: Figured I'd give you this recipe I had laying around. Try not to burn it. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}}'s Recipe
Entries.EvelynCooking: Dear @,^I usually don't give out my recipes... but since you've been such a sweetheart to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} and I, I've written this one down for you. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}'s Recipe
Entries.PamCooking: Hey Kid,^here's the recipe for a little treat my pappy used to make. Cook it slow. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}'s Recipe
Entries.GusCooking: Dear @,^Here's a recipe from my saloon. I only share this with my good friends! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}'s Recipe
Entries.ClintCooking: Well, I know a couple of recipes.^I thought I'd send you one... maybe it'll help you mine more ore or something.^Take care. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s Recipe
Entries.JodiCooking: @,^this recipe of mine won 1st place in a cooking competition! I hope you like it. Thanks for being a friend! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}'s Recipe
Entries.KentCooking: Picked up this recipe overseas. Enjoy.^Want to say thanks for making me feel welcome. ^^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}}'s Recipe
Entries.EmilyCooking: @!^Flip this letter over for instructions on how to make a super-healthy meal!^You'll feel energized. See you soon. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s Healthy Recipe
Entries.MarnieCooking: Dear neighbor,^when I'm not taking care of animals I like to experiment in the kitchen. Since we've become friends I want to share some recipes with you.^I hope you like this! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s Recipe
Entries.ShaneCooking: @,^I found this recipe in a magazine and I thought it sounded interesting. Feel free to give me a taste if you make it. hehe. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}}'s Recipe
Entries.SandyCooking: Dear @,^I was so bored out here in the desert that I wrote you a letter. There's a recipe for a delicious soup enclosed. Come visit me soon! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}}'s Recipe
Entries.WillyCooking: Dear @,^I'd like to share an ol' cooking recipe my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Pappy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}} used to make. It's important the fish is FRESH.  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}%item cookingRecipe %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s Ol' Recipe
Entries.pierreBackpack: ADVERTISEMENT:^"I keep finding cool stuff, but my backpack is full!"^^Does this sound like you? Well, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s got you covered!^^Stop by {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s General Store TODAY and check out our affordable size 24 backpack!^ See you soon![#]Backpacks From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s
Entries.pierreHours: ADVERTISEMENT:^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s General Store is now open 7 days a week![#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s Extended Hours
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^I'd like to apologize for joking about your Grandpa's old cottage when we first met. It's really a nice little house!^^However, you might need some more space someday. That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house.^(Continued on next page)^^The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^    Your local carpenter,^        {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s Services
Entries.quest35: Dear @,^you've been such a help around town since you moved here... everyone keeps telling me all the wonderful things you've done for them! Please accept this thank-you prize. ^   -Mayor%item money 2500 2501 %%[#]Thank-you From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}
Entries.CF_Fish: Dear @,^ Your angling skills surpass even my ol' {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Pappy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}}'s... I'm impressed. ^ This stardrop's been passed down from {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Sr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyGender}}}}. to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} Jr. for... oh, heck. Prob'ly a thousand years.^Seein' as I don't have any kids... I want you to have it.^^ -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}   ^  %item object 434 1 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s Family Heirloom
Entries.fertilizers: Dear neighbor,^I hope you are feeling settled in your new home. I am writing to let you know that {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s store is now selling fertilizers! Why don't you swing by and see if you can afford a few dozen boxes or so?  ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s Fertilizers
Entries.fertilizers2: Dear @,^I am now selling higher quality fertilizers, as well as new crop selections! See you soon. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s High Quality Fertilizers
Entries.abbySpiritBoard: Hi @.^One of these days you should come to my room after dark... Maybe around 8pm. ^I want to show you something. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailNickname}}'s Note
Entries.pennySpa: Meet me in the bath house after dark. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}'s Note
Entries.incubator: Dear @,^^Thank you for purchasing a coop upgrade! In addition to doubling the capacity of your coop, I've taken the liberty of installing an incubator. ^To use the incubator, simply place an egg inside. If you have space left in your coop, the egg will hatch in several days!^^As always, thanks for your business.^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}[#]About The Incubator
Entries.elliottReading: @,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}'s Reading
Entries.elliottBoat: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}'s Note
Entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}'s Surprise
Entries.samMessage: @,^meet me in front of my house tonight after dark. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}'s Note
Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}' Invitation
Entries.lewisStatue: @,^^In the future, I'd appreciate it very much if you refrained from placing my PRIVATE belongings in town for all to see!^^I'm very displeased!^^Take this money and never speak of my 'project' to anyone.%item money 750 751 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}' Angry Letter
Entries.marnieAutoGrabber: @,^I've got a new item in stock... It's called the "Auto-Grabber".^^This thing can milk your cows and goats, shear your sheep, gather eggs, and pluck your wooly rabbits... all on its own!^^It's considered a 'luxury item', so I'm charging 25,000g.^^    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}[#]Auto-Grabber Notice
Entries.EmilyClothingTherapy: @,^I have this crazy new idea that I want to involve you in... It's called "Clothing Therapy".^^Please come to the Mayor's house today to see what it's all about.^^ Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s Idea
Entries.EmilyCamping: @,^Let's go camping! ^^ Meet me in the secret woods after 10pm.^^ Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s Invitation
Entries.EmilyDoneCamping: Thanks for joining me last night... I had a great time.^I'm actually glad that bear showed up!^^See you soon^^  Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s Note
Entries.foundLostTools: Dear @,^Someone dropped your tools into the lost and found bin last night.^^I came in and set them next to your bed.^Hope I didn't wake you... ^^  -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Lost Tools
Entries.fishing2: I've got some new items in stock...^A deluxe fishing pole and some bait that you can attach to it!^You can use bait to make fish bite faster. Hope to see you soon! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s New Items
Entries.fishing6: Come by the shop and check out the new rods I'm selling.^They're the best money can buy... and you can customize them with different kinds of tackle!^Hope to see you soon! ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s New Items #2
Entries.wizardJunimoNote: My sources tell me you've been poking around inside the old community center.^Why don't you pay me a visit?^My chambers are west of the forest lake, in the stone tower. I may have information concerning your... 'rat problem'.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} %item quest 1 true %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}'s Summons
Entries.winter_18: Dear @,^I would like to give you some information about an upcoming event: the Feast of the Winter Star. It's a time for the community to come together and think back on all the good fortune we've had this year.^A favorite tradition is the "secret gift exchange", where everyone in town is randomly assigned to someone else. On the day of the festival, everyone brings a gift for their secret friend and surprise them with something special!^This year, your secret friend is:^    %secretsanta ^Don't tell anyone! The feast will take place on the 25th from 10AM to 2PM at the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Secret Gift-Giver
Entries.ccBulletinThankYou: Dear @,^Everyone around town has been talking about your great generosity lately!^Apparently, packages have been appearing in people's houses containing items they posted about years ago on the community center bulletin! And the packages are all addressed from your farm!^Thanks for going out of your way to do something like that... all of us in town are delighted! ^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Bulletin Board Thank-you
Entries.guildQuest: I see you've been exploring the old mine. You've got the adventurer's spirit, that much I can tell.^If you can slay 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in my adventurer's guild. ^Be careful.    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarlonName}} %item quest 15 true %%[#]Quest To Slay Slimes
Entries.skullCave: I see you've entered the Skull Cavern. Well done.^I've got a better challenge for you, kid. Make it at least 25 levels deep. I've got a mountain of $ to send if you can do it.^  Your friend, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}} %item quest 20 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}'s Challenge
Entries.robinWell: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} here!^I know there's a lot of stone scattered around your farm.^If you have a surplus, you might consider having me build a well for you.^Wells can be placed all over your farm, and serve as convenient places to refill your watering can.^^Just swing by my shop with 75 stones and 1000g when you're ready for it.^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}[#]Build A Well
Entries.landslideDone: To our valued JojaMart customers:^Our team members have removed the landslide caused by our drilling operation near the mountain lake. I'd like to remind you that our drilling operation is entirely legal (pursuant to init. L61091, JojaCo Amendment). Responsible stewardship of the local environment is our top priority! ^^We apologize for any inconvenience this accident may have caused.^As always, we value your continued support and patronage!^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MorrisName}},^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Removed Landslide
Entries.QiChallengeComplete: You did it.^ I'm very impressed.^ Enjoy your reward.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}. %item money 10000 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}} Challenge Complete
Entries.spring_2_1: Hello there,^Just got back from a fishing trip. You should come down to the beach some time.^I've got something for ya.^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}} %item quest 13 true %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s Invitation
Entries.spring_12: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're holding the Egg Festival in the town square. ^^You should arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to attend.^You wouldn't want to miss the annual egg hunt!^  -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Egg Festival Notice
Entries.spring_15_1: Hello, dear...^^I know you're just getting started as a gardener, so I wanted to give you a little tip.^^Most crops only grow in one season. When summer arrives, your spring crops will all die out. So plan ahead!^^-Granny {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}'s Tip
Entries.spring_23: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all getting together for the Flower Dance.^^If you can find a partner, you might even want to participate in the dance yourself!^There's a little clearing beyond the forest west of town where we hold the dance. Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you're interested.^  -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Flower Dance Notice
Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Luau.^^The highlight of the event is the communal potluck. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Luau Notice
Entries.summer_28: Dear @,^Tonight at around 10 o'clock PM, a rare and beautiful event will take place.^^The moonlight jellies will be passing by Pelican Town on their long journey south for the winter.^^We're all gathering at the beach to watch. You don't want to miss this!^See you tonight,^ -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}[#]Dance Of The Moonlight Jellies
Entries.fall_9: Dear @,^One week from today, we are holding the Stardew Valley Fair in the town square!^It's the biggest event of the year, drawing people from all across the country to our humble town.^If you'd like, you can set up a grange display for the event. Just bring up to 9 items that best showcase your talents. You'll be judged on the quality and diversity of your display.^The fair starts at 9 AM... don't miss it!^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Stardew Valley Fair Notice
Entries.fall_15: Dear @,^I just want to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening tomorrow.^Don't forget to bring your 9 items for the grange display.^Remember, the fair starts at 9AM in the town square. See you there!^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Stardew Valley Fair Reminder
Entries.fall_26: Dear @,^Notice a chill in the air? It could just be the approach of winter...^Or it could be the tingle of a dark specter, here to help us celebrate tomorrow's festival... the Spirit's Eve.^Come to town at 10 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Spirit's Eve Notice
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering in front of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s house for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Festival Of Ice Notice
Entries.spring_11_1: MISSING:^I lost my favorite Axe! If you find it, please return ASAP. I'm having a tough time without it. There's 250g in it for whoever finds the thing.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}%item quest 100 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} Lost Her Axe
Entries.spring_19_1: Farmer @-^I have a request for you. I need fresh cauliflower for a recipe I want to make. Could you bring me one?^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}}%item quest 101 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JodiName}} Asks For Cauliflower
Entries.summer_3_1: @-^This is embarrassing... I lost my lucky purple shorts. I'm telling you because I think I can trust you.^If you find them, bring them back to me DISCREETLY. I'll pay well.^Thanks.^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}%item quest 102 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} Asks For A Favor
Entries.summer_14_1: Hey Kid,^My throat's about as dry as a desert bone. I'm real thirsty for a pale ale. You got one? Regular old beer won't do. I need a pale ale.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}%item quest 103 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}'s Request
Entries.summer_20_1: @-^I'm gathering data on the correlation between soil alkalinity and crop fructose levels. Long story short, I need a fresh melon from your farm. If you brought me one I'd be very grateful.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}%item quest 104 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} Asks For A Sample
Entries.summer_25_1: To Farmer @:^My knee's acting up again, and you know what helps? ^Rubbing the darn thing with hot pepper.^ Trouble is, my supply's run dry. If you've got one to spare I'd be much obliged.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} %item quest 105 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} Needs A Pepper
Entries.fall_3_1: Dear @,^I'd like to give my cows a special treat. They're such good girls and hungry, too. Could you bring me one bunch of amaranth? They love the stuff. ^Thanks, Dear.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} %item quest 106 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}'s Request
Entries.fall_8_1: Hello,^It's blackberry season right now. The bushes are full of them. I want to pick some, but I lost my basket. Can you help?^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}%item quest 107 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}} Lost {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}} Basket
Entries.fall_19_1: @-^I'd like to buy a pumpkin from you. My daughter and I want to carve a jack-o-lantern for the upcoming Spirit's Eve festival. ^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}%item quest 108 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}'s Request
Entries.winter_2_1: Hey, I've got a little challenge for you:^    Catch me a squid.^You can fish them from the ocean at night. They only show up in the winter, though.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}%item quest 109 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s Challenge
Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} %item quest 110 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s Unusual Request
Entries.winter_12_1: @-^I am researching the forgotten art of shadow divination. I require an item known as 'Void Essence'. Bring it to me and you will be rewarded.^ -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} %item quest 111 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}'s Request
Entries.winter_17_1: @,^Sorry to bother you again, but I need another favor.^I got a new hammer and I want to try it on a variety of metals.^Could you smelt an iron bar and bring it to me? ^Thanks.^ -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} %item quest 112 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s Request
Entries.winter_21_1: @-^How are you doing? Hope the winter hasn't been too hard on you.^Anyway, I'm writing to ask you for some hardwood. I need about ten pieces, if you've got it.^If not, no worries. Take Care!^  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}%item quest 113 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s Request
Entries.winter_26_1: Dear @-^I want to make fish stew, but I need an albacore! I know they're almost out of season... sorry about the short notice. Could you catch one for me?^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}%item quest 114 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} Needs A Certain Fish
Entries.spring_1_2: Notice:^^The price of raw materials at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}'s shop and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}'s shop has increased.[#]Raw Material Price Notice
Entries.spring_6_2: @-^I'm really craving a fresh apricot. I haven't been able to find one at the store, so I'm asking you. I'll pay you well for it!^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}%item quest 115 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s Request
Entries.spring_15_2: Dear @,^I'd like to surprise my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} with a gift. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}'s a big fan of leeks. Could you bring me one?^   -Granny {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}%item quest 116 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EvelynName}}'s Surprise
Entries.spring_21_2: NOTICE^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}} here... I really, really want a plate of sashimi. I'll pay top coin to whoever brings me some.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}%item quest 117 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s Craving
Entries.summer_6_2: Fisherman Wanted^I need a good pufferfish specimen. I'm conducting an experiment on the toxin created by the pufferfish.^Reward: 1000g^ -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}%item quest 118 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}' Study On Toxins
Entries.summer_15_2: Dear Farmer @,^I'd like to give my wife a starfruit for our anniversary. Are you growing any on your farm? If you brought me one, I'd be very grateful.^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}}%item quest 119 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentName}} Needs A Gift
Entries.summer_21_2: @,^I need truffle oil. Don't ask me why.^ -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}%item quest 120 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}' Request
Entries.fall_6_2: Wanted: 1 Fresh Lobster for a marvelous bisque I'm creating.^Who: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}, proprietor of the Stardrop Saloon^Reward: 800g %item quest 121 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} Needs Lobster
Entries.fall_19_2: NOTICE^Does anybody have one of them battery packs? My TV remote died, and it's a real hassle getting off the couch to change the station.^  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}%item quest 122 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} Needs Help
Entries.winter_5_2: @,^I'm creating an enchanted staff of phenomenal power.^However, I'm missing something: an Iridium Bar.^I'm willing to pay 5x the market value for it. Bring it as soon as you can.^ -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} %item quest 123 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} Needs A Rare Item
Entries.winter_13_2: I've got another challenge for you: Catch me a Lingcod.^They don't go down easy, but I know you can do it.^  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}%item quest 124 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}'s Challenge #2
Entries.winter_19_2: Dear @,^I'm at my wit's end. I desperately want to make a Coco-no-no at the saloon, but I have no way of getting a coconut!^Can you help me?^  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}%item quest 125 %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} Needs A Coconut
Entries.winter_24: Dear @,^Tomorrow is the Feast of the Winter Star.^Did you get a gift for your 'secret friend'... %secretsanta?^The feast starts at 9 AM in the town square. See you then! ^   -Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}[#]Feast Of The Winter Star Reminder
Entries.passedOut1_Billed_Male: Dear Mr. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^(You've been billed {0}g for this service)^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MorrisName}}^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Invoice
Entries.passedOut1_Billed_Female: Dear Ms. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^(You've been billed {0}g for this service)^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MorrisName}}^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Invoice
Entries.passedOut1_NotBilled_Male: Dear Mr. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^Since you have no money, we were obligated by law to provide this service free of charge.^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MorrisName}}^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Legally Required Notice
Entries.passedOut1_NotBilled_Female: Dear Ms. @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^Since you have no money, we were obligated by law to provide this service free of charge.^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MorrisName}}^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Legally Required Notice
Entries.passedOut2: @, ^You're lucky I found you last night! You were unconscious, and someone was searching your pockets. I have no idea how much money they took... they ran away as soon as I approached. Be more careful!^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}[#]Note From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}
Entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^I've billed you {0}g to cover your medical expenses.^^-Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}[#]From The Office Of Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}
Entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You'd passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^Since you have no money, I provided your medical care free of charge.^^-Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}'s Free Medical Service
Entries.passedOut4: @, ^^Found you face-down in the mud during my 3:00 AM sweep.^^You should try to make it home a little earlier next time!^^     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarlonName}}[#]Note From {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarlonName}}
Entries.elliottLetter1: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}}
Entries.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} 2
Entries.elliottLetter3: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} 3
Entries.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've travelled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} 4
Entries.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} 5
Entries.elliottLetter6: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} 6
Entries.MarlonRecovery: @,^Found your lost item.^^Be more careful next time!^   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarlonName}}%item itemRecovery %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarlonName}} Found Your Item
Entries.CarolineTea: Dear @,^^Thanks for stopping by my sunroom yesterday. I usually drink tea alone, but it was fun to share with you!^^I've enclosed instructions on how to prepare and grow your own tea. No pressure, but if you do end up growing some, make sure to bring me a cup!^^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}%item craftingRecipe Tea_Sapling %%[#]{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}'s Tea Note
Entries.WoodChipper: Hey @,^^Just wanted to let you know about a new item I'm carrying... it's called a 'Wood Chipper'.^^You can use it to break hardwood into several pieces of regular wood!^^I know wood can be hard to come by in the winter, so if your supply gets low, consider picking one up.^       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}[#]Wood Chipper Notice
